titleStmt.title: The vanity of thovghts discovered with their danger and cvre. By Tho: Goodvvin, B.D.
titleStmt.author: Goodwin, Thomas, 1600-1680.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by M[iles]. F[lesher]. for R. Dawlman, and L. Fawne, at the signe of the Brazen Serpent in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Cf. Folger catalogue, which gives signatures: A-F¹² .
Running title reads: The vanitie of thoughts.
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery, San Marino, California.

place.placeName: the signe of the Brazen Serpent in Pauls Church-yard
